title: Leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size
yAxis: Exhibition space in thousand square feet
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Exhibition space in thousand square feet for 10 number of Buildingss.
The maximum Exhibition space in thousand square feet 1000.0 is found at Buildings Enercare Centre and the minimum is found at Vancouver Convention Centre where Buildings is 311.5.
The maximum Buildings Enercare Centre has got 3.21 times higher Exhibition space in thousand square feet than the minimum Buildings Vancouver Convention Centre.
